name: Hola Cat
description:
Hola Cat is a new, fun and addictive puzzle game suitable for all ages.

- Find the correct orientation of the objects to deliver and shoot the yarn ball to deliver it to your cat and make her happy!

- Avoid dropping the ball on the ground as you have 3 balls for each level.

- The puzzles become harder as you advance through handcrafted levels.

- Various objects may make finding the correct path easier or harder for you!

- We hear you! Make sure to rate Hola Cat and let us know about what you like!
